bibl.title: P.Ryl. Greek Add. 1166: Christian Prayer Amulet with a Tax Receipt on the Back.
bibl.note: P. Ryl. Inv. Greek Add. 1166. Tertembuthis (or at least Hermopolite nome), end of the 6th or beginning of the 7th century AD. - Prayer Amulet. - Receipt for the payment of wheat (and money?).
bibl.seg: Roberta Mazza, P.Ryl. Greek Add. 1166: Christian Prayer Amulet with a Tax Receipt on the Back.
P. Ryl. Inv. Greek Add. 1166. Tertembuthis (or at least Hermopolite nome), end of the 6th or beginning of the 7th century AD. - Prayer Amulet. - Receipt for the payment of wheat (and money?).
